display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (Apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and >= 3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.
calculation: 60 * (hrembp3 + hrop3 + hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + carbp + carop + canbp + canop + oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop) / slpprdp
